title: Tsaratsovo
text:
Тsaratsovo () is a village in the <a href="Plovdiv%20Province">Plovdiv Province</a>, central <a href="Bulgaria">Bulgaria</a>. It is part of the <a href="Maritsa%20Municipality">Maritsa Municipality</a> and it has 2,216 inhabitants.
In 2007 a several million <a href="euro">euro</a> electronics plant was inaugurated in Tsaratsovo. It has a built-up area of 3,000 m² and employs 80 workers.
In the same year a new <a href="bicycle">bicycle</a>-producing factory was opened near the village. It has an area of 34,000 m² of which the built-up area is 23,600 m². The plant is going to produce 500,000 bicycles a year and employs more than 500 people. Large part of the production is exported to <a href="Russia">Russia</a>, <a href="Serbia">Serbia</a> and <a href="Montenegro">Montenegro</a>.
